name: HTML
des: Hypertext Markup Language, is a coding language that defines the structure and meaning of content on a web page. It's the most fundamental building block of the web

name: CSS
des: Cascading Style Sheets, a programming language used to style and structure web pages. CSS is a key technology for the World Wide Web

name: Javascript
des: Interpreted language that directly translates JS code into machine language code

name: ReactJs
des: JavaScript library that helps developers create interactive user interfaces (UIs) for web and mobile applications.

name: VueJs
des: Open source JavaScript framework that helps developers build user interfaces for web applications

name: GitHub
des: Web-based platform that allows users to store, share, and collaborate on code. It's a popular resource for programmers and is used by many companies and organizations to manage projects and collaborate.

name: Angular
des: Open-source, JavaScript framework written in TypeScript to develop single-page applications.
